attributes.additional_details:
For the Government to abolish the existing crude and unfair stamp duty introduced by our then Chancellor Gorden Brown. For a fairer phased taxation system.
0% up to 250000, 1% up to 500000 and 2% above this. Incidently MP's did not and still do not pay this tax as they simply flip homes between constituancy home and their supposed main home. All perfectly legal of course.
